alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Lawrence (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 01 at 9:57PM CST until January 10 at 4:30PM CST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues or the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River at Seymour. White River at Elliston down to Hazleton. Wabash River at Lafayette down to Riverton. Mississinewa River at Ridgeville. .Antecedent soil moisture...and upwards of an additional one and a half inches of rainfall this weekend...has returned several rivers to flood. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH MONDAY, JANUARY 10... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Riverton. * WHEN...Until Monday, January 10. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Extensive lowland flooding is in progress. High water surrounds many river cabins. Access to most river cabins is by boat only. Levees begin to protect farmland. Extensive flooding of Leaverton Park occurs in Palestine, Illinois. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CST Saturday /10:00 PM EST Saturday/ the stage was 17.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 PM CST Saturday /10:00 PM EST Saturday/ was 17.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.2 feet early Wednesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Monday, January 10. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued by noon Sunday.
